title: Chocolate Island
description: A mountainous island with brown terrain hence the name Chocolate. Nearby there is also a sunken ship. Her boss is Wendy O. Koopa.

tasks.title: Monty Mole
tasks.description: may suddenly appear from the ground. Its subspecies is large (Mega Mole).

tasks.title: Sumo Bro
tasks.description: when he stomps his foot, he creates a lightning bolt, causing a sea of ​​flames to appear.
